steps.title: Welcome!
steps.content: This interactive site reveals 15 distinct ideological clusters among likely voters in the 2024 election. Discover where you fit and explore the political landscape.

steps.title: Explore the Landscape
steps.content: View clusters in 3D and 2D. Each point represents an ideological clusterâ€”hover to see demographics, vote shares, and policy positions. Point size shows prevalence; color shows Party ID (red = Republican, blue = Democrat).

steps.title: Find Your Cluster
steps.content: Answer 10 questions to discover which cluster you belong to. The quiz uses machine learning to predict your cluster with 61% accuracy.

steps.title: Chat with Personas
steps.content: Each cluster is represented by a simulated persona based on real survey data. Ask them about political issues and see how different ideological groups think.

steps.title: About
steps.content: In the About tab, I describe the methodology and provide links to technical documentation.
